page.title: 09Farming.
page.content: The two farms in this area are of grade 3/4 land and grade 2/3 type. The larger farm (270 acres) has a tenant occupier. However the smaller farm is fully equiped while its counterpart has machinery brought over from the home farm in Hayle. Milk is sold the Milk Marketting Board from the stock of Fresians and heifers on both farms. There are no more than two workers on each farm and the farms are subject to quotas. Farms in this area in the eighties face problems eith EEC quotas and over-production. There is also a farm called Magar farm - which we were unable to visit.
